issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A big user story that needs to be broken down. Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete.
issuetype.name: Epic

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

comments.body: I am seeing same issue with AWS JAVA SDK 1.7.1

I also tried with following but it does not work:

{code}
  // configure path-style S3 access if desired
  s3.setS3ClientOptions( new S3ClientOptions().withPathStyleAccess( true ) );
{code}

objectstorage properties:

{code}
PROPERTY	objectstorage.bucket_creation_wait_interval_seconds	60
PROPERTY	objectstorage.bucket_naming_restrictions	extended
PROPERTY	objectstorage.cleanup_task_interval_seconds	60
PROPERTY	objectstorage.dogetputoncopyfail	false
PROPERTY	objectstorage.failed_put_timeout_hrs	168
PROPERTY	objectstorage.max_buckets_per_account	100
PROPERTY	objectstorage.max_total_reporting_capacity_gb	2147483647
PROPERTY	objectstorage.providerclient	walrus
PROPERTY	objectstorage.queue_size	128
PROPERTY	objectstorage.queue_timeout	1
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3client.buffer_size	524288
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3client.connection_timeout_ms	10000
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3client.max_connections	64
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3client.max_error_retries	3
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3client.socket_read_timeout_ms	30000
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3provider.s3accesskey	********
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3provider.s3endpoint	uninitialized-s3-endpoint
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3provider.s3secretkey	********
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3provider.s3usebackenddns	false
PROPERTY	objectstorage.s3provider.s3usehttps	false
{code}
Thanks to [~shaon] I got it working with AWS JAVA SDK 1.6.12 it would be good to have support for AWS JAVA SDK latest release.
Large feature-sized changes needed. Must go into a minor release not sub-minor (bug fix release)

I have a customer who has recently run into this problem on 4.1.2.  I noticed that this was tagged to be fixed in 4.2.0 but the resolution is still listed as Unresolved.  Can someone clarify if this is still an issue that needs to be fixed or was it fixed in 4.2.x?

I have numerous customers who have now ran into this issue and are forced to migrate their development to actual AWS.  Considering AWS added SigV4 to S3 over 2 years ago, and all of the SDKs and third party apps are following suite, it is becoming increasingly difficult to use Eucalyptus for valid S3 testing.  Using an older SDK is not a valid workaround at this point (maybe it was a year or so ago).

Please advise when this problem with be resolved.

Thank you.
Verified that with AWS Java SDK 1.11.77 S3Sample code works out the box.
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
